name: Section Outline (Lua)
description: Generate outlines and summaries of project sections
author: VS Write Team

tools.name: section_outline
tools.description: Generate a structured outline of the project sections, showing hierarchy, word counts, and entity mentions

include_word_count.description: Include word count for each section. Defaults to true.

include_entities.description: Include entity mentions in each section. Defaults to true.

tools.name: section_detail
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific section including content preview, entities, and metadata

section_id.description: The ID of the section to examine

preview_length.description: Number of characters to include in content preview. Defaults to 500.
